entities.name: goblins
entities.description: Goblins are mentioned as running for cover in the hallway. ("Goblins and wizards shrieked and ran for cover")

entities.name: wizards
entities.description: Wizards are mentioned as running for cover in the hallway. ("Goblins and wizards shrieked and ran for cover")

entities.name: dragon
entities.description: The dragon is mentioned as being present in the hallway, blasting its way out of a passage. ("had blasted their way out of the passage into the marble hallway.")

relationships.description: Goblins and wizards are mentioned as being in the same location, running for cover. ("Goblins and wizards shrieked and ran for cover")
The dragon is mentioned as causing fear or distress to the goblins, who are running for cover. ("had blasted their way out of the passage into the marble hallway.")
The dragon is mentioned as causing fear or distress to the wizards, who are running for cover. ("had blasted their way out of the passage into the marble hallway.")
